title: [whacky health bars] pics attached
body: First heard about{{champion:161}} 's health bar, but didn't have the champ to test. {{champion:59}} 's health bar is low and to the left.{{champion:111}} 's health bar is high. Probably more out there.

replies.body: Hey there, thanks for the report! We'll see what's going on.
Hey KateyKhaos, Here is a screencap of Fizz. It's from spectator so the pic is not as clean. It's Tundra Fizz, not sure if skins affect the health bar at all.
Help me my pbe account password and phone number changed what can i do
You'd need to submit a player support ticket [here](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new).
Katey, also can you explain why j4 is so small? It seems that he has shrunken
J4's still the same size, it's just the positioning of his health bar that's giving him the illusion of a smaller appearance.
Renektons health bar is messed up too. I dont know about the regular skin but the pool party renekton looks really small

I remember seeing this, but I couldn't recreate it in custom game with his standard skin. Does the health bar start offset at spawn or does something trigger it like a knock up? Post a screen cap here if you have or can get one.
Oh, because my friends and I were extremely weirded out by it. It made it harder to land skill shots.

I will keep an eye out for more visual bugs. I can't get back to the game lobby after leaving a custom games without restarting. I already submitted a bug report about this. It would help speed up testing and confirming bugs. Thanks.
